meanings.definition: A person who works on or navigates a river.
meanings.sent1: The rivermen guided the boat down the river.
meanings.sent2: The rivermen were skilled at navigating the waterways.
meanings.sent3: The rivermen joked about racing each other in their boats.
meanings.sent4: The rivermen were the unsung heroes of the river, silently ensuring safe passage.
meanings.sent5: The rivermen's knowledge of the river was unmatched.
